subject: Motor tracking
description_text:
Hi, Just trying to get a tracking number for my motors for order
#SSN4997

Thanks

conversations.body_text:
Hello? Still just looking for an update on my motors whereabouts please.
Thanks

On Mon, Dec 29, 2025 at 2:31 PM Cory Clark <coryclarkinsurance@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi, Just trying to get a tracking number for my motors for order
> #SSN4997
>
> Thanks
>
Hi Cory Clark,  I will check the shipping status of your Click VAM Pro order. The delay may be due to stock shortage, and I will confirm the details for you as soon as possible.

Ok, thanks for the update.

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 9:37 PM service@simsonn.com

Hey any update on this?

On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 9:40 PM Cory Clark <coryclarkinsurance@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Ok, thanks for the update.
>
> On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 9:37 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Cory Clark,    Your package has been shipped. We apologize for the delay.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELU1875479838YQ

No problem, thank you for the update.

On Wed, Dec 31, 2025 at 2:18 AM service@simsonn.com
